r.d:
PCS provides a fast and easy way to mix C and PHP code in your PHP extension.
PHP code can be embedded in the compiled module or distributed as a separate file tree.
Compatibility : PHP 5 (5.3+) and 7
r.n: - Improve registration and load logic - Fix static compile - Add information methods: PCS\Mgr::fileCount/fileInfos/symbolInfos - Add PCS\Display class (PHP code) to display information about virtual files and symbols as plain text or html - Add tests
